article_title: H&R Block Yearly Profit Falls Slightly
article_text:
H&R Block Inc. reported that its earnings fell slightly for the business year ended in April as the tax-preparation company said the latest U.S. tax season was complicated by impacts from the Affordable Care Act and concerns about tax identity theft.

Returns prepared by and through H&R Block world-wide declined 0.1% to 24.2 million. Total U.S. returns prepared by and through H&R Block fell 4.4%, which the company partly...
